item.title: Foxconn builds AI factory in partnership with Taiwan and Nvidia
item.description: Nvidia and Foxconn announced they are working with the Taiwan government to build an AI factory supercomputer.

item.title: Nvidia launches AI-first DGX Personal Computing Systems
item.description: Nvidia announced that Taiwan’s leading system manufacturers are set to build Nvidia DGX Spark and DGX Station systems.

item.title: Nvidia-powered supercomputer to enable quantum leap for Taiwan’s research
item.description: Nvidia is powering a supercomputer at Taiwan’s National Center for High-Performance Computing that’s set to deliver over eight times more AI performan...

item.title: Nvidia powers world’s largest quantum research supercomputer
item.description: Nvidia announced the opening of the Global Research and Development Center for Business by Quantum-AI Technology.

item.title: Nvidia provides Omniverse Blueprint for AI factory digital twins
item.description: Nvidia today announced a significant expansion of the Nvidia Omniverse Blueprint for AI factory digital twins, now available as a preview.
